headline: Show HN: MakeTime – A simple tool to help you schedule reading time
description:
There is so much good content on HackerNews. Too much sometimes. I often just click on articles, realize it's very long, go back to HackerNews, and never really read anything!

Introducing MakeTime! When you come across an artcile worth reading, use MakeTime to help you schedule a time dedicated towards reading that article.

I built MakeTime for myself and I've been getting so much more value out of being on the internet. Hope you enjoy!
headline_zh-Hans: Show HN: MakeTime - 一个简单的工具来帮助你安排阅读时间
headline_zh-Hant: Show HN: MakeTime - 一個簡單的工具來幫助你安排閱讀時間
description_zh-Hans:
HackerNews上有太多的好内容。有时太多了。我经常只是点击文章，发现它非常长，然后回到HackerNews，但从未真正读过任何东西！

介绍一下MakeTime! 当你遇到一篇值得阅读的文章时，用MakeTime来帮助你安排一个专门阅读该文章的时间。

我为自己建立了MakeTime，我从互联网上得到了更多的价值。希望你喜欢!
description_zh-Hant:
HackerNews上有太多的好內容。有時太多了。我經常只是點擊文章，發現它非常長，然後回到HackerNews，但從未真正讀過任何東西！

介紹一下MakeTime! 當你遇到一篇值得閱讀的文章時，用MakeTime來幫助你安排一個專門閱讀該文章的時間。

我為自己建立了MakeTime，我從互聯網上得到了更多的價值。希望你喜歡!
